00056 char vd_rm(const string &in_fn, const char *rm) {
00057     ipfstream in(in_fn.c_str());
00058     if( ! in ) {
00059             if( errno != ENOENT ) return 111; 
00060             return 1;
00061     }
00062     string out_fn(in_fn+'.'+uniq());
00063     opfstream out(out_fn.c_str(), ios::trunc);
00064     if( ! out ) return 111;
00065     
00066     string ln;
00067     string::size_type rml = strlen(rm), ln_len;
00068 
00069     bool found = false;
00070     while(getline(in, ln)) {
00071             ln_len = ln.length();
00072             if( ln_len > rml + 1
00073                 && ln[rml] == ':'
00074                 && ! memcmp(ln.data(), rm, rml) ) {
00075                     found = true;
00076                     continue;
00077             }
00078             out<<ln<<endl;
00079             if( ! out ) {
00080                     unlink(out_fn.c_str());
00081                     return 111;
00082             }
00083     }
00084     if( in.bad() ) {
00085             unlink(out_fn.c_str());
00086             return 111;
00087     }
00088     out.close();
00089     if( ! found ) {
00090             unlink(out_fn.c_str());
00091             return 1;
00092     }
00093     if( ! out ) {
00094             unlink(out_fn.c_str());
00095             return 111;
00096     }
00097     
00098     struct stat st;
00099     if( stat(out_fn.c_str(), &st) ) {
00100             unlink(out_fn.c_str());
00101             return 111;
00102     }
00103     if( ! st.st_size ) {
00104             char ret=2;
00105             if( unlink(in_fn.c_str()) ) {
00106                     ret = 111;
00107             }
00108             unlink(out_fn.c_str());
00109             return ret;
00110     }
00111     
00112     if( fstat(in.rdbuf()->fd(), &st)
00113         || chown(out_fn.c_str(), st.st_uid, st.st_gid)
00114         || chmod(out_fn.c_str(), st.st_mode & 07777) ) {
00115             unlink(out_fn.c_str());
00116             return 111;
00117     }
00118 
00119     return rename(out_fn.c_str(), in_fn.c_str()) ? 111 : 0;
00120 }

00122 int main( int ac , char ** av ) {
00123         try {
00124                 if( ac != 2 ) {
00125                         cerr<<"usage: "<<*av<<" alias_to_remove"<<endl
00126                             <<"Program removes alias from virtualdomains."<<endl
00127                             <<"Program returns 0 on success, 1 if file was not changed,"<<endl
00128                             <<"2 if file was removed, anything else on error."<<endl;
00129                         return 111;
00130                 }
00131 
00132                 string fn(ac_qmail.val_str()+"/control/virtualdomains");
00133 
00134                 opfstream lck((fn+".lock").c_str());
00135                 if( ! lck ) return 111;
00136         
00137                 if( lock_exnb(lck.rdbuf()->fd()) ) return 111;
00138     
00139                 return vd_rm(fn, av[1]);
00140         } catch(...) {
00141                 return 111;
00142         }
00143 }
